content: Damn, I overshot my worth, told them I needed $3 an article. Who’d a thunk that was too high? Most writers seem to be getting about a buck per article, which is unbelievable. Nobody seems to understand what writing takes, how much time, how much energy, and emotion goes into writing a piece. I may be prolific this week, so I’d earn what? $6? Oh well, I write because I write. I am a writer. Money aside. It’s what I am. And you’re a good writer, too, but I’ve told you that already.
